com.microsoft.windowsazure.serviceruntime

Class RoleEnvironmentChangingEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.microsoft.windowsazure.serviceruntime.RoleEnvironmentChangingEvent

  • public class RoleEnvironmentChangingEvent
extends java.lang.Object
    Occurs before a change to the service configuration is applied to the running instances of the role.

    Service configuration changes are applied on-the-fly to running role instances. Configuration changes include changes to the service configuration changes and changes to the number of instances in the service.

    This event occurs after the new configuration file has been submitted to Windows Azure but before the changes have been applied to each running role instance. This event can be cancelled for a given instance to prevent the configuration change.

    Note that cancelling this event causes the instance to be automatically recycled. When the instance is recycled, the configuration change is applied when it restarts.

    See Also:
    RoleEnvironmentChangingListener, RoleEnvironmentChangedEvent

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void cancel()
      Cancel the configuration change.
      java.util.Collection<RoleEnvironmentChange> getChanges()
      Returns a collection of the configuration changes that are about to be applied to the role instance.

    • Method Detail

      • cancel

        public void cancel()
        Cancel the configuration change.

        Cancellation causes the role instance to be immediately recycled. The configuration changes are applied when the instance restarts.

      • getChanges

        public java.util.Collection<RoleEnvironmentChange> getChanges()
        Returns a collection of the configuration changes that are about to be applied to the role instance.
        Returns:
        A java.util.Collection object containing RoleEnvironmentChange objects that represent the configuration changes that are about to be applied to the role instance.
        See Also:
        RoleEnvironmentChange
